experience.title: Investor Relations Executive
experience.description: ‚Äì Involved in end to end execution for 7 Fundraise deals having innovative startups from Seed to Series A Stage and 2 M&A deals.‚Äì Assisted the team and introduced 10 new Investors for the Company from my self-originated network.Day to Day responsibilities included‚Äì Helping Clients in formulating their complete fundraise strategy which includes creating funding road map, refining the funding terms and marketing materials, identifying right investors, assisting clients in Investor meetings and negotiations‚Äì Preparation of Investors Sheet including with their Investment thesis, In-depth Analysis of Sector of Investment, Sharing Pitch deck, Arranging the Meeting between VC investors and Startup founders and Assisting in the conference calls of Investors and Startup Founder to understand more deeply about their Requirement.‚Äì Identifying prospective clients and further conducting due diligence on the basis of Investment Thesis, Sector of Choice and Ticket sizes.‚Äì Identifying and searching Investors on Daily basis and extended Network with 100+ Investors in the firm
